questions.subject: general-intelligence
questions.explanation: The series follows: 1×2, 2×3, 3×4, 4×5, so next is 5×6 = 30

questions.questionEn: If BOOK is coded as CPPL, how is READ coded?
questions.questionHi: यदि BOOK को CPPL लिखा जाता है, तो READ को कैसे लिखा जाएगा?
questions.subject: general-intelligence
questions.explanation: Each letter is moved one position forward: B→C, O→P, O→P, K→L. So READ becomes SFBE.

questions.questionEn: Find the odd one out: Apple, Orange, Banana, Carrot
questions.questionHi: विषम चुनें: Apple, Orange, Banana, Carrot
questions.subject: general-intelligence
questions.explanation: Carrot is a vegetable while Apple, Orange, and Banana are fruits.
